name: enterprise-content-ontology
description: AI-powered content intelligence for Adobe Edge Delivery Services. Query your content inventory, identify gaps, and generate context-aware content briefs.
author: WKND

tools.name: query_content_inventory
tools.description: Search and query the content inventory. Find pages by topic, content type, funnel stage, or audience. Returns structured metadata about matching pages.

site_id.description: Filter by site ID (e.g., 'wknd'). Optional - omit to query all sites.

search.description: Free text search in page paths and titles

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

tools.name: get_content_gaps
tools.description: Identify content gaps in the inventory. Shows topics missing content at specific funnel stages, helping prioritize content creation.

topic.description: Analyze gaps for a specific topic, or leave empty for all topics

funnel_stage.description: Find topics missing this specific funnel stage

tools.name: generate_content_brief
tools.description: Generate an AI-powered content brief based on the ontology context. Uses existing content patterns, brand voice, and gap analysis to create actionable briefs.

topic.description: The primary topic for the new content

content_type.description: The type of content to create

funnel_stage.description: Target funnel stage for the content

tools.name: get_brand_context
tools.description: Get brand context and content patterns from the ontology. Returns information about brand voice, common topics, content structure patterns, and terminology.

aspect.description: Which aspect of brand context to retrieve

tools.name: get_related_content
tools.description: Find content related to a specific page or topic. Useful for internal linking, content clusters, and understanding content relationships.

path.description: The page path to find related content for

tools.name: get_performance_insights
tools.description: Get performance insights from RUM analytics. Shows top performers, underperformers, and patterns to inform content strategy.

tools.name: get_page_performance
tools.description: Get detailed performance data for a specific page. Shows Core Web Vitals, engagement metrics, and optimization recommendations.

path.description: The page path to get performance data for

tools.name: list_sites
tools.description: List all sites in the content ontology. Shows site name, domain, page count, and topic count for each site.

tools.name: get_site_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific site including stats and configuration.

context_providers.name: content_summary
context_providers.description: Provides a summary of the content inventory for context
